name: Neurology
detail: Neurology is the branch of medicine concerned with the study and treatment of the nervous system.

name: Eye Care
detail: Healthy Eyes · Eat a Balanced Diet. fruit vegetables. Exercise improves blood circulation, which improves oxygen.

name: Traumatology
detail: Traumatology: The branch of surgery that deals with injured patients, usually on an emergency basis.

name: Dental care
detail: Oral Health Overview ... Good dental or oral care is important to maintaining healthy teeth, gums and tongue.

name: Kidney
detail: The kidneys are a pair of bean-shaped organs on either side of your spine, below your ribs and behind your belly.

name: Medicine
detail: Medicines can treat diseases and improve your health. You need to take medicine at some point in your life.

name: Cardiology
detail: Cardiology is the study and treatment of disorders of the heart and the blood vessels.

name: X-ray
detail: An X-ray is a quick, painless test that produces images of the structures inside your body — your bones.
